entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mingan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Longue-Pointe-de-Mingan 06:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: SSW 15 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near noon then clearing. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 50 gusting to 70 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
